title: AGNFAB
author: AGNFAB
content: Hi guys, I thought I share the link to the auction of my painting "A New Dawn", since the auction's just 1 day away. Check out 'A New Dawn,' a 1/1 acrylic painting on a 73x60cm linen canvas. My buddy did an awesome job framing it too. Tnx for the incredible work!/SIDThe countdown to the auction: https://scarce.city/auctions/a-new-dawn2

comments.author: StackItUp
comments.body: Good luck on your auction !Big time for collectors, this painting looks stunning ❤️
